title: Kivalina v. ExxonMobil Corp. - Wikipedia
text:
Kivalina v. ExxonMobil Corporation, et al. is a lawsuit filed on February 26, 2008,
in a United States district court. The suit, based on the common law theory of
nuisance, claims monetary damages from the energy industry for the destruction
of Kivalina, Alaska by flooding caused by climate change.
